### 1. Source data
```{r source, warning = TRUE, results = FALSE, message = FALSE}

   library (tidyverse)
   library (janitor) 
   library (rtweet)

   tweets_raw <- get_timeline("soroosj", n=1000)
```
   
### 2. Transform data
```{r transform, message = F}

  library (lubridate)

   tweets <- tweets_raw %>%
      filter (is_retweet == FALSE) %>%
      rename (
         likes = favorite_count,
         retweets = retweet_count,
         created = created_at
         ) %>%
      mutate (
         text_length = str_length(text),
         text = str_sub(text,1,60),
         created = as.Date(created),
         year = year(created)
         ) %>% 
      filter(
         #year == 2019,
         is_retweet == FALSE
         ) %>%
      select (rank, text, year, likes, retweets, created)
   
   tweets_agg <- tweets %>%
         group_by (year) %>%
         summarize (
            n = n (),
            likes = sum(likes),
            retweets = sum (retweets)
            ) %>%
         mutate(likes_per_tweet = round(likes/n,2))
```

#3a.  Visualize - text level
```{r chart, warning = TRUE, message = FALSE}

   library (gt)

   tweets %>%
      arrange (-likes, -retweets) %>%
      head (10) %>%
      mutate (rank = min_rank(-likes)) %>%
      select (-year) %>%
      gt () %>%
      kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
```


#3b.  Visualize - text level
```{r chart, warning = TRUE, message = FALSE}

   library (gt)

   tweets %>%
      arrange (-retweets, -likes) %>%
      head (10) %>%
      mutate (rank = min_rank(-retweets)) %>%
      select (rank, text, retweets, likes, created) %>%
      gt () 
```


#3c.  Visualize - aggregate level
```{r}

  tweets_agg %>%
      group_by (year) %>%
      arrange (-year) %>%
      kable () %>%
      kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", full_width = F, position = "left")
```
